snippet.title: Among the Others (The Love of Creation) - Trailer
snippet.description:
Among the Others - The Love of Creation is a modification of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Mega Drive by Unlimited Trees. This is an epic trailer edited by SpectraS02.

Play the demo here:
https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/among-the-others-sage-2018-demo.173/

The game will be coming to the Sonic Amateur Games Expo (as a small demo only) and as a complete game to the Sonic Hacking Contest.

CREDITS:
Project Leader/Artist/Everything - Unlimited Trees

Trailer - SpectraS02

Special Thanks to Novedicus and LooneyDude
